thread.title: CAROADSTER

author: CAROADSTER
title: CAROADSTER
text: With all the various web sites I found offering visa services, I was very worried about identity theft, security, and not getting my money taken for nothing. However, the closest consulate to me would have required me to fly to San Francisco or New York so I decided to give this site a shot. EVERYTHING worked out JUST as described! I received email updates (since I ended up starting the process too early, I received an email that the service would begin the application process as soon the Indian government would accept it -- 30 days or less from departure). Sure enough, once there were 30 days left before my trip, I received an email telling me the application had been submitted -- less than 24 hours later, I had my acceptance email plus a .pdf of the approved visa AND a link to the Indian government website (which I verified) where I could verify the approval status. Sure, I'd love to pay less but this service DELIVERS what they say they will. Also, I received confirmation that the US Embassy had received my registration (an extra optional service I chose that cost another $5, I think). If you're looking for a trustworthy legit fast online service, this is it!!!
